column5: First they trade Jeff Carter, now they trade Mike Richards   Holy moly!

What??? Ok time for me to stop crying about the cup and get back into the game. Only 3mths to go!!  Edit: Just read about it.... Carter for Jakub Voracek and a 2011 1st & 3rd pick sounds like a good deal, as long as they draft well in this year's "decent" pool of youngsters. Richards for Braydon Shenn, Wayne Simmonds and a 2012 2nd....I'd rather Richards.

When Carter was moved I didn't think to much of it but Richards ???  I would have considered them a cup favorite for next year with the signing of Bryzgalov but I suppose they don't wanna win for a few years...  Schenn, simmonds and a voracek are all good so is a 1st round pick but seems like a couple odd moves, unless they need the cap space to sign Bryzgalov?
Move Richards??????    Dont know about that, he is the heart and spoul of the team, reminds me of a more pissed of Steve Y!    Think that was a bad move.
cap space to sign Bryzgalov?   Exactly!  Rob C
Just in, hot off the press,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,  Leafs give up 14 players for a goaltender,Tim Thomas,as they only need one goal scorer and a goalie that can stop pucks.
WOW! That came out of no where. That's around 100 million dollars of cap cleared.

i expected carter.  he's been in rumours for weeks because of the bryzgalov move...  richards was strange!  no worries for me though. next to matt cooke i think richards is one of the cheapest players in the nhl.  never seen him lay a big bodycheck that wasn't blindside or from behind and never gets suspended because he wears a C.
Richards did appear to have much teflon.
Thats right clearing out some cap space
Wow I never thought the doctor and I would see eye to eye on anything hockey related, but I could not agree more on your Richards comments. Glad he`s going to the west coast!!!
haha... he's seriously the biggest coward and a total cheap shot artist.  he actually belongs on the habs!
I will take the high road!!!
